job_tasks.phrase: define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of building and managing a technology platform, which falls under traditional software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform.
job_tasks.justification: Defining technology choices and future architecture are key aspects of software engineering and platform development.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need.
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing tools and automation for users, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the standard software development lifecycle activities of building, testing, and deploying software.

soft_skills.phrase: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with various teams, indicating a need for strong communication and teamwork skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams to identify shared (technical) approaches.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the importance of collaborating with technical teams to align on approaches, a key communication and collaboration skill.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need.
soft_skills.justification: This indicates collaboration with a specific user group (artists) to understand their needs and develop solutions, requiring communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline, pick up enhancements and implement directly.
soft_skills.justification: Documenting and training users are direct applications of communication and collaboration skills.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on the development, architecture, and deployment of a rendering technology pipeline. There are no mentions of AI or Machine Learning tasks, models, or specific AI/ML tools, aligning the role exclusively with core software engineering responsibilities.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally clear and detailed regarding its focus on software engineering and pipeline development. It explicitly states the responsibilities and does not include any AI/ML components, making the classification unambiguous.
